text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ehe, I did it. My Café au Lait is safe today.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: To think there would be a day when I wouldn't trip…… Finally, I can drink it!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ngh!? I-It's not sweeet!? I bought it blaaaack～～!!
